wikipedia_page.main:
Nesta Davies is a British retired figure skater who competed in ice dance.
With partner Paul Thomas, she won silver at the third-ever World Championships in ice dancing in 1954.

response: | 1954 ||  Oslo ||  Jean Westwood / Lawrence Demmy ||  Nesta Davies / Paul Thomas ||  Carmel Bodel / Edward Bodel
| 1954 ||  Bolzano ||  Jean Westwood / Lawrence Demmy ||  Nesta Davies / Paul Thomas ||  Barbara Radford / Raymond Lockwood ||

Paul Thomas is a British former ice dancer. With partner Pamela Weight, he is the 1956 World champion and European champion. With partner Nesta Davies, he is the 1954 World & European silver medalist. He currently coaches at the Calalta Figure Skating Club in Calgary, Alberta
